contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
Hello everyone,
 
I'm looking to extend the multi-filter functionality of the ContentHub asset list to filter items based on their **Location** path.
Specifically, I have hundreds of assets stored under a parent folder and its subfolders. I’d like to display only those assets that are located under a specific parent folder—essentially filtering by a partial match in the **Location** field.
![1.00](https://i.postimg.cc/VvTk2rZH/image-24.png)
Has anyone implemented a similar path-based filter or found a workaround for this?
Any guidance or suggestions would be appreciated!
Thanks in advance.
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: 30.6.0
* .NET version: 8
* Execution environment: Private cloud (Azure/AWS/Virtual machine)
